attributes.action: Allow under 25's to have a smear test done to help prevent cervical cancer.
attributes.background: I have all the symptom's that could be a sign of cervical cancer but due to me being under the age of 25 my GP said I am not entitled to have a smear test done. Cervical cancer is caused by HPV Human Papillomavirus this a virus that is caused by sexual contact with a man.

rejection.details:
We have several petitions calling for specific changes to the age for smear tests. You may want to sign whichever of these you agree with:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106617
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106855
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/116257
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/109073
